subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Eric Gordon makes every move look naturally smooth — the slick drives to the basket, the whip passes to teammates, the poke-away steals, even his long 3-pointers.
snippet: Eric Gordon makes every move look naturally smooth — the slick drives to the basket, the whip passes to teammates, the poke-away steals, even his long 3-pointers.
